text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Hyatt Regency Hotel, and my experience was nothing short of exceptional. The hotel’s location is ideal – right in the heart of the city, making it incredibly convenient to reach major shopping malls, business hubs, and tourist attractions. The grand entrance sets the tone for the luxury that follows, and upon arrival, I was greeted warmly by the staff. The check-in process at the reception was smooth, and the team was both professional and attentive.

The room was immaculate, spacious, and tastefully decorated in a modern style. The bed was exceptionally comfortable, and all essential amenities such as high-speed Wi-Fi, a stocked minibar, and a beautiful city view were readily available. The bathroom was well-maintained, with premium toiletries, hot water, and a high standard of cleanliness.

The hotel also offers premium facilities including a swimming pool, a well-equipped gym, and a relaxing spa, all of which I thoroughly enjoyed. The in-house restaurant served a wide variety of dishes, with the breakfast buffet being an absolute highlight – offering a delicious and diverse spread to suit every palate.

What stood out the most was the attentive service. The staff consistently went above and beyond to ensure a comfortable and pleasant stay.

In short, Hyatt Regency is a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience, making it an excellent choice for both business travelers and families. I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting the city.

places.shortFormattedAddress: ITC MAURYA, Sardar Patel Marg, Akhaura Block, Diplomatic Enclave, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi

editorialSummary.text: Upscale hotel with posh rooms & suites, as well as 5 restaurants, 2 bars, an outdoor pool & a spa.

text.text: The check-in process was not a great start. Even though they send multiple emails asking if you need anything prior to check-in, it appears they don’t actually look at your response. Neeraj in the Summit Lounge made-up for the concierge’s mistakes, though. Normally traveling with children in high-end resorts can make you feel isolated, but he made us feel so welcome by bringing course after course of warm food for the kids and refreshing (amazing) drinks for the adults. He was the star of the show! The pool was a favorite for our whole group, although it is shut down in the rain. The food options pleased all. The limited seating in the pavilion was not ideal, and the wait staff there could use more training. The showstopper was the rooms - I was amazed by the intricate details in design and the comforting amenities that make you feel at home. The beds do seem bigger than they appear in the pictures, too.

text.text:
I had a truly wonderful experience at ITC Delhi, and a major part of that was thanks to the incredibly warm and attentive staff.

A special shoutout to Shalu, the Front Office Manager, who went above and beyond to ensure my comfort. I was running late due to unexpected traffic, and she graciously extended my stay time without any hassle, making sure I didn’t feel rushed. Her calm demeanor, professionalism, and genuine care were truly appreciated.

The entire team at ITC was equally courteous, warm, and welcoming — from the front desk to housekeeping to the restaurant staff. There’s a certain sense of warmth and hospitality that makes you feel like more than just a guest.

Thank you ITC Delhi for such a lovely and seamless experience. I’m definitely coming back! 🌟

text.text: Living away from home, I wanted to surprise my parents for their anniversary, and ITC Maurya helped make it possible. Over the phone, Pam from Guest Relations coordinated everything — from arranging a cake and flowers to adding small personal touches that made the celebration feel special. She made sure the surprise went smoothly and that my parents enjoyed the moment. Even from a distance, it felt like I was part of their day, and I really appreciate the effort that went into making it happen.

editorialSummary.text: Chic hotel offering a restaurant & a shopping mall, plus a wellness spa with an outdoor pool.

text.text: The hotel is not in a very exclusive environment and it is strange that anyone other than hotel guests can enter, as it is also a mall. The business room is well equipped, but the cleanliness and housekeeping leave something to be desired. The staff at the reception is very nice and helpful, the same cannot be said about the waiters in the restaurant, who practically treat the guests as guests. They do not offer drinks and are not helpful. We would have liked to have a glass of wine with dinner, but we did not have the opportunity to do so. The hotel also offers conference facilities and it is very frustrating that almost exclusively men who are thought to be dressed walk around the hotel, take pictures of each other and occupy the elevators at almost all hours of the day, reacting aggressively if the elevator does not go where they want. The confectionery operating in the hotel is refreshing, they serve very delicious cookies here. Dinner and breakfast are well-stocked, although it would be expected in a 5-star international hotel chain not to feature exclusively Indian cuisine...

text.text:
Average Experience at The Ashok Hotel, New Delhi

The location of The Ashok Hotel, New Delhi is undoubtedly brilliant, offering a grand view and a central position that is convenient for business and leisure travelers alike.

However, the rooms are quite old and lack modern amenities or updated technologies. The television does not support streaming applications, which is disappointing for a hotel of this stature. The washroom conditions are only average, and overall the property seems to be in need of refurbishment.

The service quality was average, with staff support not meeting expectations of a five-star property. The buffet food was also average, lacking variety and the finesse one would expect.

Overall, while the location and history of the hotel stand out, the rooms, service, and food quality need significant improvement to match modern hospitality standards.

text.text:
5-Star Review: Perfect Stay Near the Railway Station!

I had a wonderful experience staying at this hotel conveniently located near the railway station. From the moment I arrived, the staff was warm, welcoming, and always ready to assist with a smile. The check-in process was quick and hassle-free, which was perfect after a long train journey.

The room was clean, spacious, and well-furnished with all the essential amenities. The bed was extremely comfortable, ensuring a restful night's sleep. I was pleasantly surprised by how quiet it was inside the room despite being so close to the station.

The location is incredibly convenient—just a short walk from the railway station, making it ideal for travelers who want easy access to transport. There are also plenty of restaurants and shops nearby.

Overall, I highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for comfort, convenience, and great service. I’ll definitely be staying here again on my next visit

The hotel is at a great spot in the middle of the city, making it easy to go to the main attractions.  The facilities were great, especially the pool, which was clean and welcoming. There were a lot of fresh and tasty choices for breakfast, and it was great.  I also liked that the room had free tea and water, which was a nice touch.  The view from the hotel was also amazing, which made the whole trip even better.  This hotel is highly recommended for anyone who wants a clean, comfortable, and centrally located place to stay with amazing amenities.

text.text:
I stayed at The Metropolitan Hotel in New Delhi for just one night, but the experience was very pleasant overall. The check-in process was smooth and efficient, and the staff were courteous and helpful throughout my stay.

The room was clean, well-maintained, and quite comfortable, with all the expected amenities. I appreciated the peaceful ambiance, which made it easy to relax after a busy day. To point one major issue was the washroom door lock was broken and the water used to be clogged near the comod area, which made it difficult and unpleasant while using the washroom.

Breakfast offered a good variety of Indian and international options, and the service at the restaurant was attentive.

Recommend that you book the hotel through any online portal where the prices are cheaper then on direct contact the reception for booking.

Overall my stay was ok.

text.text:
Complaint Against Ashok Country Resort
I'm writing to formally complain about Ashok Country Resort. I want to warn future customers who are thinking of staying there because their services are very bad.
They only give two small water bottles for each room. If you need more water, you have two bad choices: you either have to pay ₹84 for a tiny 500ml bottle, or they give you an unsealed, used water bottle.
When I asked about the used bottle, the person at the front desk actually said, without any shame, "Sir, we have washed this bottle and filled the water." This means they are taking bottles that other guests have used, washing them, refilling them, and then giving them to new guests to drink from.
This practice is very unhealthy and dangerous. What if the person who used the bottle before had a serious sickness? They just wash it and give it to you to drink from. This is completely wrong and risky for customers' health.
I am sharing my personal experience with DLF Club 3, as they provide best-in-class services. This serves as a recommendation for those who wish to invest the same amount of money and receive superior service.
Sharing photos for ref.

text.text:
I recently stayed at Hotel Viva Palace and would describe the experience as decent for the price point. Initially, I was given a room where the AC was quite noisy and the direct sunlight made the room very warm, which affected the cooling. However, upon requesting a change, the staff promptly shifted me to a better room which was more comfortable.

One thing that stood out (and not in a great way) was that cold water is chargeable—even during peak summer—which felt a bit unreasonable, especially when you're already provided complimentary regular water. It would be great if the hotel considered including cold water as part of the basic amenities, at least during the hotter months.

Breakfast was decent with enough variety to satisfy most guests, though it’s best not to compare it with a 5-star buffet. The in-room food service was on the slower side, but the housekeeping staff were quite cooperative and attentive to our needs, which helped improve the overall experience.

In summary, it feels like a solid 3-star hotel experience. If the management wants to maintain or justify a 4-star label, there’s definitely room for improvement—particularly in service efficiency and guest comfort standards. Still, it’s a reasonable stay for the price.

One thing that stood out (and not in a great way) was that cold water is chargeable—even during peak summer—which felt a bit unreasonable, especially when you're already provided complimentary regular water. It would be great if the hotel considered including cold water as part of the basic amenities, at least during the hotter months.

Breakfast was decent with enough variety to satisfy most guests, though it’s best not to compare it with a 5-star buffet. The in-room food service was on the slower side, but the housekeeping staff were quite cooperative and attentive to our needs, which helped improve the overall experience.

In summary, it feels like a solid 3-star hotel experience. If the management wants to maintain or justify a 4-star label, there’s definitely room for improvement—particularly in service efficiency and guest comfort standards. Still, it’s a reasonable stay for the price.

text.text:
I recently stayed at this hotel and would like to share my experience:
✅ Positives:
- The rooms were clean and well-maintained.
- Staff service was courteous and responsive, which made the stay pleasant.
⚠️ Areas for Improvement:
- The washrooms had water leakage issues, leading to stagnation — this needs urgent attention for hygiene and safety.
- During the complimentary breakfast, I noticed small cockroaches on the table, which was quite off-putting.
- The breakfast is priced at ₹300, which feels steep considering the limited variety and quality offered. It comes across as a budget spread, so either the pricing or the offerings should be reconsidered.
💡 Overall: The hotel has potential with its clean rooms and good staff service, but it needs to improve its maintenance and food hygiene standards to offer better value for money

text.text:
Good Food, Quick Service – A 4-Star Experience

I recently stayed at this property and would rate my overall experience at about 4 stars. The rooms, while clean, were relatively small and felt a bit cramped — especially if you're someone who values space or traveling with family.

However, what truly stood out and elevated the experience was the food quality and the prompt room service. The meals were flavorful, well-prepared, and consistently delivered hot and on time. The kitchen and service staff deserve credit for their efficiency and attentiveness.

This place is a decent option if you're looking for a short stay and prioritize good food and quick service over room size and amenities. A little improvement in room comfort could make this a much stronger contender.

text.text:
Unthinkable!!Denied Hotel entry despite having paid voucher!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Please never book or stay in this hotel. I had not unforgettable but unthinkable experience in my life.
I booked Delhi-37 Mahipalpur hotel  via Easemytrip (EMT118678143) for 11-Jun to 12-Jun-2023.
I reached hotel around 4.00PM. There was one receptionist girl on desk and 2 staffs sitting nearby.
For a very long time they could not locate the booking and finally after 1/2-hour struggle, they located
booking but said it is not paid hence we can not allow you to check-in, despite the fact that  i showed printout
of EasemyTrip receipt, mentioning clearly the amount paid, room type etc. etc. Finally they called to their manager and decided that they can not allow me to check-in and I need to make fresh booking with them and payment (approx. about 4000/-) at the counter.
It is left to one's speculation, do these hotels have any sense of hospitality???? Can they just deny guest at their whims and fancies!!!

From the moment I stepped into JW Marriott Aerocity, I was greeted with warm hospitality and an unmistakable sense of luxury. The ambiance is elegant and modern, with every detail thoughtfully designed to create a world-class experience.

The rooms are spacious, impeccably clean, and offer every comfort one could ask for—plush bedding, high-end amenities, and stunning views of the city. Dining at their restaurants was a highlight—each meal was a culinary delight, especially at K3, which offers a fantastic range of global cuisines.

The staff deserves special mention—professional, courteous, and genuinely attentive to every guest’s need. Whether it was the concierge, housekeeping, or the front desk, everyone went above and beyond to make the stay seamless.

Its location in Aerocity is ideal—just minutes from the airport and close to major business hubs, yet peaceful and relaxing.

Highly recommended for business travelers, couples, or anyone looking to indulge in refined luxury with flawless service. I will absolutely be returning.

text.text:
A great 5 star property but it did not check all the boxes. The mattress in the room was very bad. It was a spring mattress in which I was completely sunken and woke up with a bad backache. Rest of the days, I had to sleep with a pillow under my back. Do not recommend it if you have back problems.
I tried their Spa and had the worse experience. I had booked an early morning massage before leaving but they failed to make a reservation, so on one was available. When I went, the guy at the desk decided to give me the massage. He had no knowledge of any pressure points and at one point he was only applying oil and doing nothing else. It was so bad that I decided to stop it at 40 mins into a 60 min massage.
Overall I had come to the city to run some errands, so the location was helpful. Staff and valet were very courteous and polite. Flower decoration in the lobby was specially wonderful. It was a sight for the sore eyes.

text.text:
Convenient, Clean, and Comfortable Stay Near New Delhi Railway Station

Located just a short walk from New Delhi Railway Station, this hotel is a great choice for travelers looking for a clean, comfortable, and affordable stay. The rooms are adequately sized, well-maintained, and equipped with modern amenities—perfect for a short stopover or transit stay.

The staff were courteous and went out of their way to assist us, even during odd hours, which was truly appreciated.

The property also features its own restaurant, Ly Fire N Ice, located nearby. It’s a great spot to unwind, offering a pleasant ambiance and a menu full of tasty, reasonably priced food. A lovely place to relax and grab a meal after a long journey.

Do note that since the hotel is situated in a busy main market area, accessing it with large suitcases can be a bit tricky. However, if you're traveling light, especially with just a backpack, it's an easy and convenient walk.

Overall, a solid option for a short, restful stay in a prime location.

The staff were courteous and went out of their way to assist us, even during odd hours, which was truly appreciated.

The property also features its own restaurant, Ly Fire N Ice, located nearby. It’s a great spot to unwind, offering a pleasant ambiance and a menu full of tasty, reasonably priced food. A lovely place to relax and grab a meal after a long journey.

Do note that since the hotel is situated in a busy main market area, accessing it with large suitcases can be a bit tricky. However, if you're traveling light, especially with just a backpack, it's an easy and convenient walk.

Overall, a solid option for a short, restful stay in a prime location.

I stayed one night at this hotel and had the worst experience.
There was a strong smell of cigarettes in the room, and when I asked to change rooms, they refused. The washroom was also in poor condition. The lift wasn’t working properly—I got stuck in it for more than 10 minutes.
My booking included breakfast, but when I asked for it at 8:00 AM, they said it wouldn't be available before 9:30 AM. If they can't provide breakfast as promised, they should refund the amount.

Overall, a very disappointing and frustrating stay.

**Luxurious Comfort and Impeccable Hospitality: A Review of Hyatt Regency Hotel, Delhi

Nestled in the heart of India's bustling capital, Hyatt Regency Hotel stands as a beacon of luxury and refinement amidst the urban landscape of Delhi. Boasting world-class amenities, impeccable service, and a strategic location, this five-star establishment offers discerning travelers an unforgettable stay that epitomizes elegance and comfort.

**Exquisite Accommodations:**
From opulent suites to tastefully appointed guest rooms, Hyatt Regency Hotel presents a range of accommodation options designed to cater to the diverse needs of its guests. Each room exudes contemporary elegance, featuring plush furnishings, modern amenities, and panoramic views of the city skyline or lush greenery. Whether seeking a relaxing retreat or a productive workspace, guests are greeted with a haven of comfort and tranquility in every corner.

**Gourmet Dining Experience:**
The hotel's culinary offerings are a culinary delight, showcasing a diverse array of flavors from around the globe. Indulge in a gastronomic journey at its signature restaurants, where master chefs craft exquisite dishes using the finest ingredients. From authentic Indian cuisine at 'The China Kitchen' to delectable international fare at 'Café', every dining experience is a celebration of taste and refinement.

**World-Class Facilities:**
Hyatt Regency Hotel leaves no stone unturned when it comes to providing guests with an unparalleled experience. State-of-the-art facilities such as a fully equipped fitness center, rejuvenating spa, and sparkling swimming pool cater to the wellness and leisure needs of discerning travelers. Additionally, the hotel's versatile event spaces and comprehensive business amenities make it an ideal choice for corporate gatherings, conferences, and social events of all scales.

**Exceptional Service:**
What truly sets Hyatt Regency Hotel apart is its commitment to personalized service and hospitality excellence. From the moment guests step foot into the lobby, they are greeted with warm smiles and attentive assistance from the dedicated staff. Whether it's arranging transportation, organizing bespoke experiences, or fulfilling special requests, the team goes above and beyond to ensure every guest's stay is nothing short of extraordinary.

**Strategic Location:**
Situated in the diplomatic enclave of Delhi, Hyatt Regency Hotel enjoys a prime location that offers convenient access to the city's major attractions, business districts, and transportation hubs. Whether exploring historical landmarks such as Humayun's Tomb and India Gate or conducting business in the bustling commercial districts, guests find themselves perfectly positioned to navigate the city with ease.

In conclusion, Hyatt Regency Hotel in Delhi sets the standard for luxury hospitality, combining unparalleled comfort, exquisite dining, and exceptional service to create a truly memorable experience for every guest. Whether visiting for business or leisure, this prestigious establishment embodies the epitome of refined elegance and sophistication, making it the preferred choice for discerning travelers seeking a sanctuary of luxury in the heart of India's capital.

text.text:
As a frequent traveler to Delhi for both business and leisure, I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Hyatt Regency Delhi, and I must say, it consistently delivers an exceptional experience.
From the moment you step into the grand lobby, you're greeted with an ambiance of sophistication and warmth. Check-in was incredibly smooth and efficient, with the staff being remarkably welcoming and professional. Their hospitality truly sets the tone for the entire stay.
My room was spacious, impeccably clean, and offered all the comforts one could wish for. The bed was incredibly comfortable, ensuring a restful night's sleep, and the modern amenities, including a well-appointed bathroom, made my stay very convenient.
One of the major highlights of the Hyatt Regency Delhi is undoubtedly its dining options. I particularly enjoyed the breakfast spread, which was a lavish affair with a fantastic variety of Indian and international cuisines – something for everyone! The in-house restaurants like The China Kitchen and La Piazza also lived up to their reputation for exquisite food and excellent service.
The hotel's location is another huge plus. Situated in Bhikaji Cama Place, it's perfectly positioned for easy access to business hubs, major attractions, and the airport. Whether I needed to attend meetings or explore the city, getting around was never an issue.
The facilities, including the pool and fitness center, were well-maintained and provided a great way to unwind after a busy day. What truly stands out, however, is the staff. Every interaction, from the front desk to housekeeping to the restaurant teams, was marked by genuine politeness, attentiveness, and a willingness to assist. They really go the extra mile to make guests feel valued.
While it is a premium hotel, the overall experience, the quality of service, and the luxurious setting make it well worth the price. I would highly recommend the Hyatt Regency Delhi to anyone looking for a top-tier stay in the capital. I'm already looking forward to my next visit!

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the ITC Maurya Hotel in Delhi, and I must say, it was an absolutely exceptional experience from start to finish. This hotel truly deserves every one of its five stars and more. Allow me to share my delightful experience.

From the moment I stepped into the grand lobby, I was greeted by the friendly and attentive staff who made me feel like a VIP. The check-in process was smooth and efficient, and I was immediately impressed by the luxurious and elegant ambiance of the hotel.

The rooms at ITC Maurya are simply stunning. Spacious, beautifully decorated, and equipped with modern amenities, they provided a comfortable and relaxing sanctuary after a long day of exploring the city. The attention to detail in the room design was impeccable, and the plush bedding ensured a restful night's sleep.

One of the highlights of my stay was the incredible dining options available at the hotel. The restaurants showcased a diverse range of cuisines, each offering an exceptional culinary experience. Whether it was the authentic Indian delicacies at Bukhara or the delectable international fare at Pavilion, every meal was a gastronomic delight. The attentive service and impeccable presentation added an extra touch of elegance to my dining experience.

The hotel's facilities were equally impressive. The fitness center was well-equipped, allowing me to maintain my workout routine even while traveling. The spa was a haven of tranquility, offering a wide range of rejuvenating treatments. The outdoor pool area provided a refreshing oasis in the heart of the bustling city, and the meticulously maintained gardens added a touch of serenity to the surroundings.

What truly sets ITC Maurya apart is its exceptional service. The staff members consistently went above and beyond to ensure my stay was memorable. From the doormen to the housekeeping staff, everyone was friendly, professional, and dedicated to making my experience unforgettable. I was truly impressed by the level of personalized attention I received throughout my stay.

The hotel's location is another advantage. Situated in the diplomatic enclave of Delhi, it offers convenient access to major attractions, shopping areas, and business districts. Whether I wanted to explore historical landmarks or indulge in retail therapy, everything was within easy reach.

In conclusion, ITC Maurya Hotel Delhi surpassed my expectations in every way. The impeccable service, luxurious accommodations, outstanding dining options, and convenient location all contributed to an unforgettable five-star experience. I wholeheartedly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a truly exceptional stay in Delhi. I can't wait to return for another memorable visit!

text.text:
My wife and I stayed at this hotel from July 31, 2023 to August 5, 2023. Perhaps one of the most expensive hotels in Dwarka area.

The hotel building is in a unique circular design, featuring a courtyard on the main floor enveloped by the circular structure. Rooms oriented towards the interior of the circular building, in my view, lack privacy offering views of the ground floor courtyard and other hotel rooms.

Initially assigned such a room, we requested a relocation to an exterior room, and the hotel accommodated our request. As no deluxe rooms were available on the outer circle we were upgraded to a suite. This is the reason for the five stars for service and room. Am posting a photo of the circular hotel building and our upgraded room.

Despite the standard provision of bathrobes in five-star establishments, Radisson at this location did not offer them. I brought this discrepancy to the attention of one of the managers, emphasizing that although the hotel's website mentioned the availability of robes, none were provided.

There was a medical student convention going on at the hotel throughout our stay which added to long waits to get elevators which was quite annoying.

The food was mediocre. Our stay did not align with the anticipated standards of a five-star hotel.

text.text:
During my recent stay at Radisson Blu, Dwarka, Delhi, I found the experience to be a mix of positives and areas that need improvement.

Ambiance & Setting:
The hotel boasts a modern design with a well-maintained lobby and a welcoming atmosphere. However, while the exterior and common areas give a premium feel, the overall upkeep could be better.

Rooms & Comfort:
The rooms were a bit smaller than expected for a five-star property. Though the furnishings were decent, the cleanliness was average—not quite up to luxury standards. The view from the room was pleasant, which added to the stay’s comfort.

Service:
The staff was courteous and helpful, but service was not as polished as one would expect from a five-star hotel. Some requests took longer than usual to be fulfilled.

Food & Dining:
The in-house restaurants offer a good variety of dishes, with quality and taste being satisfactory. However, the pricing felt slightly high for the overall experience provided.

Cleanliness & Hygiene:
This was one of the weaker aspects of the stay. While not unclean, the hotel did not meet the expected five-star cleanliness standards. The housekeeping could be more meticulous.

Overall Experience:
Radisson Blu Dwarka feels more like a 3.5-star hotel rather than a true 5-star experience. While it has its strengths—such as location, ambiance, and dining—the room size, cleanliness, and service efficiency leave room for improvement. A decent stay, but expectations should be adjusted accordingly.

The in-house restaurants offer a good variety of dishes, with quality and taste being satisfactory. However, the pricing felt slightly high for the overall experience provided.

Cleanliness & Hygiene:
This was one of the weaker aspects of the stay. While not unclean, the hotel did not meet the expected five-star cleanliness standards. The housekeeping could be more meticulous.

Overall Experience:
Radisson Blu Dwarka feels more like a 3.5-star hotel rather than a true 5-star experience. While it has its strengths—such as location, ambiance, and dining—the room size, cleanliness, and service efficiency leave room for improvement. A decent stay, but expectations should be adjusted accordingly.

text.text:
The Ashok Hotel in Chanakyapuri, Delhi, is a well-known luxury hotel that blends classic charm with modern amenities. Here are some highlights from a typical review:
Ambiance and Decor: The Ashok Hotel exudes a regal ambiance with its elegant decor and spacious interiors. The design reflects a blend of traditional Indian and contemporary styles, providing a luxurious and comfortable environment.
Rooms: The rooms are spacious and well-appointed, featuring comfortable beds, modern bathrooms, and all the necessary amenities such as Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, and minibars. Many guests appreciate the cleanliness and attention to detail in room service.
Dining: The hotel offers a variety of dining options, including multiple restaurants serving diverse cuisines ranging from Indian to international. The quality of food and service is generally praised, with many guests enjoying the fine dining experience.
Service: The staff at The Ashok are often commended for their professionalism and hospitality. Guests frequently mention the courteous and helpful nature of the employees, which enhances the overall experience.
Facilities: The hotel boasts extensive facilities, including a swimming pool, fitness center, spa, and business center. These amenities cater to both leisure and business travelers, making their stay more convenient and enjoyable.
Location: Situated in the diplomatic enclave of Chanakyapuri, The Ashok enjoys a prime location. It is close to major tourist attractions, government offices, and embassies, making it a convenient choice for travelers.
Events and Conferences: The hotel is renowned for hosting large events, conferences, and weddings. Its extensive banquet halls and conference facilities are well-equipped to handle various types of gatherings, with many guests appreciating the organizational capabilities of the hotel staff.
Overall, The Ashok Hotel in Chanakyapuri, Delhi, is often praised for its luxurious ambiance, excellent service, and convenient location. It remains a preferred choice for both domestic and international travelers seeking a premium stay in the heart of Delhi.

text.text: Zing at The Metropolitan Hotel offers an unforgettable dining experience with a perfect blend of ambiance, flavors, and top-notch service. From signature cocktails to comforting Chicken e Khao Suey, crispy Mozzarella Sticks, and juicy Chicken Lollypop, every bite was a delight. The Zing Quesadilla, creamy Pasta, and Polo Al Maroosh pizza were standout mains, while the buffet spread impressed with fresh salads, tarts, and desserts. text.text:
I recently stayed at the Metropolitan Hotel in New Delhi and had an exceptional experience. This 5-star property exceeded my expectations with its impeccable service, modern amenities, and prime location.

Room and Amenities
My deluxe room was tastefully decorated, spacious, and well-equipped with a comfortable bed, minibar, and high-speed internet. The bathroom was sleek and clean. The hotel's outdoor pool, fitness center, and spa offered welcome relaxation.

Dining
The Metropolitan's restaurants served exquisite cuisine. Sakura's Japanese dishes impressed, while Chutney's Indian delicacies delighted. The breakfast buffet at Zing offered diverse options.

Service
The staff's warmth, efficiency, and attention to detail made our stay memorable. From check-in to checkout, every interaction was seamless.

Location
Conveniently situated near Connaught Place, the hotel provided easy access to Delhi's key attractions.

Areas for Improvement
1. Room soundproofing could be enhanced.
2. Parking fees seemed steep.

Recommendation
The Metropolitan Hotel is ideal for business travelers and tourists seeking luxury, comfort, and convenience. With minor tweaks, it could achieve perfection.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Park Inn by Radisson Hotel for a marriage event, and I must say, it was an excellent experience from start to finish.
The rooms were spacious, well-maintained, and provided a high level of comfort. The cleanliness and hygiene were impeccable, making the stay even more pleasant. The hotel offers extra beds upon request, which was quite helpful during our stay. It’s clear that the housekeeping team pays attention to every detail, ensuring guests feel at ease and comfortable.
The food served at the hotel was outstanding. Every meal was flavorful, well-prepared, and thoughtfully presented. Whether it was breakfast, lunch, or dinner, there was a great variety of options to choose from, and everything was delicious. The quality of the food matched the hotel’s reputation, and it certainly added to the overall positive experience.
What truly set the stay apart was the exceptional service provided by the hotel staff. They were not only professional but also kind and attentive, ensuring all our needs were met. They made us feel welcomed and were always ready to assist with a smile. Whether it was assisting with room arrangements or providing directions, their hospitality made a significant impact on our experience.
My stay at Park Inn by Radisson was a memorable one. From the clean and comfortable rooms to the delicious food and outstanding service, everything exceeded my expectations. The hotel provided a perfect environment for a wedding stay, and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable, comfortable, and pleasant stay.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hotel Viva Palace, and I must say that it exceeded all my expectations. From the moment I stepped into the hotel, I was greeted with warm smiles and excellent service that lasted throughout my entire stay.

The first thing that struck me was the hotel's elegant and modern decor. The lobby was spacious, tastefully decorated, and exuded a sense of luxury. The check-in process was smooth and efficient, and the staff at the front desk were incredibly helpful, providing me with all the necessary information about the hotel's facilities and amenities.

Upon entering my room, I was delighted to find a well-appointed and immaculately clean space. The room was spacious, beautifully furnished, and equipped with all the modern amenities one could ask for. The comfortable bed ensured a restful night's sleep, and the soundproofing was excellent, allowing for a peaceful and quiet environment.

One aspect of Hotel Viva Palace that truly stood out was the exceptional level of service provided by the staff. From the housekeeping team to the restaurant staff, everyone I encountered was friendly, professional, and went above and beyond to ensure that my needs were met. Whether it was arranging transportation, offering recommendations for local attractions, or simply providing a warm greeting, the staff consistently demonstrated their commitment to guest satisfaction.

The dining options at Hotel Viva Palace were also impressive. The breakfast buffet offered an extensive selection of both local and international dishes, catering to all tastes. The quality of the food was superb, and the attentive staff ensured that all guests had a delightful dining experience.

Additionally, the hotel's amenities were top-notch. The fitness center was well-equipped, allowing me to maintain my exercise routine during my stay. The spa facilities were a haven of relaxation, and the skilled therapists provided rejuvenating treatments that left me feeling pampered and refreshed.

Hotel Viva Palace's location was another highlight. Situated in a prime area, it offered easy access to popular attractions, shopping centers, and vibrant nightlife. Whether I wanted to explore the city's cultural landmarks or indulge in some retail therapy, everything was within close proximity, making my stay all the more convenient and enjoyable.

Overall, my experience at Hotel Viva Palace was truly exceptional. The combination of luxurious accommodations, impeccable service, and convenient location made it an ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers alike. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone seeking a memorable stay and look forward to returning on my next visit to this wonderful city.

Whether it was arranging transportation, offering recommendations for local attractions, or simply providing a warm greeting, the staff consistently demonstrated their commitment to guest satisfaction.

The dining options at Hotel Viva Palace were also impressive. The breakfast buffet offered an extensive selection of both local and international dishes, catering to all tastes. The quality of the food was superb, and the attentive staff ensured that all guests had a delightful dining experience.

Additionally, the hotel's amenities were top-notch. The fitness center was well-equipped, allowing me to maintain my exercise routine during my stay. The spa facilities were a haven of relaxation, and the skilled therapists provided rejuvenating treatments that left me feeling pampered and refreshed.

Hotel Viva Palace's location was another highlight. Situated in a prime area, it offered easy access to popular attractions, shopping centers, and vibrant nightlife. Whether I wanted to explore the city's cultural landmarks or indulge in some retail therapy, everything was within close proximity, making my stay all the more convenient and enjoyable.

Overall, my experience at Hotel Viva Palace was truly exceptional. The combination of luxurious accommodations, impeccable service, and convenient location made it an ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers alike. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone seeking a memorable stay and look forward to returning on my next visit to this wonderful city.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Hari Piarko hotel and I must say, I was thoroughly impressed with my experience. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warm hospitality and a welcoming atmosphere. The room was spacious, well-appointed, and had all the amenities I needed for a comfortable stay. The bed was incredibly comfortable and the linens were of high quality, ensuring a good night's sleep.

One of the highlights of my stay was the food. The restaurant offered a wide variety of delicious cuisine, both local and international. The chefs were skilled and the presentation of the dishes was top-notch.

The hotel's location was also a major plus, being in close proximity to many popular tourist attractions and shopping areas. The staff were always available to offer recommendations and provide information about the local area, which made my stay even more enjoyable.

Overall, I would highly recommend the Hari Piarko hotel to anyone looking for a comfortable and enjoyable stay. The combination of excellent service, luxurious accommodations, and a fantastic location make this hotel an excellent choice.

text.text:
I had an excellent stay at Hotel Hari Piorko in New Delhi! The location couldn’t be better—just a short walk to RK Ashram Marg Metro Station and New Delhi Railway Station, making it super easy to get around the city. The hotel is in the lively Paharganj area, so there’s plenty to explore in the neighborhood.

The hotel itself is very safe, clean, and hygienic. My room and the facilities were spotless, with modern bathrooms, comfortable bedding, and amenities like a large circular sink, towel rack, and contemporary lighting. Reliable air conditioning and Wi-Fi were a big plus.

I found the restaurant and café areas vibrant and inviting, with a great selection of cuisines and desserts. The “Fire & Ice” multi-cuisine restaurant and the “Cool Scoop” snack bar add to the overall enjoyable experience. The travel desk and money exchange on-site make it especially convenient for international visitors.

The staff is truly outstanding—friendly, cooperative, and always ready to help with anything from check-in to travel arrangements. They made sure I felt at home during my stay.

Overall, Hotel Hari Piorko offers great value for money with its perfect location, excellent amenities, and welcoming atmosphere. Highly recommended for tourists and travelers looking for comfort, cleanliness, and convenience in central Delhi!

text.text:
During my recent visit to Delhi, I had the pleasure of staying at Hotel Hari Piorko, located in the vibrant and bustling neighborhood of Paharganj. While the hotel itself offers a comfortable and convenient stay, what truly elevated my experience was the outstanding service provided by Roshan, the front desk manager.
From the moment I arrived, Roshan made me feel welcome. His warm smile, professional demeanor, and genuine willingness to help set the tone for my entire stay. He handled my check-in swiftly and efficiently, and even took the time to explain the local area, suggesting places to eat, shop, and explore. It’s rare to find someone so dedicated to guest satisfaction, and Roshan’s attentiveness made a lasting impression.
Hotel Hari Piorko is a well-known budget hotel in Paharganj, popular among both domestic and international travelers. The location is ideal—just a short walk from the New Delhi Railway Station and close to Connaught Place, making it easy to explore the city. Despite being in a busy area, the hotel maintains a peaceful atmosphere inside, which is perfect for unwinding after a day of sightseeing.
The rooms are spacious, clean, and thoughtfully designed. I stayed in a deluxe room, which came with a comfortable bed, air conditioning
